messages.message: Hi, I’m really frustrated. I can’t access my Hellmann's account, and it’s been days!
I apologize for the inconvenience, Wendy. Let me help you with that.
I’ve tried resetting my password multiple times, but nothing works. This is really unacceptable!
I understand how upsetting this must be for you. Can you please provide me with the email linked to your account?
It’s wendy@example.com. I just want to use my account like I used to!
Thank you for that information, Wendy. I’ll look into this issue for you right away.
I just don’t understand how this could happen. I rely on my Hellmann's account for everything!
I completely understand your frustration. We're doing our best to resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
I hope so. I really need access to my account soon!
